mapper.select: select m.nickname as reportedName, reported_id, count(reported_id) as reportCount from tb_report r join tb_member m on reported_id = m.id where reported_id = m.id group by reported_id, m.nickname having count(reported_id)>1

select r.id, type, r.target_id, r.content, mr.nickname as reportedName, rm.nickname as reportName from tb_report r join tb_member mr on (r.reported_id = mr.id) join tb_member rm on (r.report_id = rm.id)
